xocs:funding.xocs:funding-agency-matched-string: National Natural Science Foundation of China

organization.$: School of Information Science and Engineering, Central South University

head.citation-title: Color to gray with color saliency map
head.abstracts: We present a new and simple color to gray algorithm by analyzing the visual perception phenomenon. The QPFT (Quaternion Phase-spectrum of Fourier Transform) is used to obtain the color saliency map of the color image. The two input variables are carefully designed. One variable is a chromatic lightness term based on Helmholtz- Kohlrausch effect, which corrects physical luminance derived from the color's saturation component; the other variable is the hue component of the color image. Hence, the saliency map synthetically reflects the differences of luminance, saturation and hue components of the color image. Finally, the saliency map is used to enhance the luminance. Experiment results show that our resulting grayscale image looks more visually consistent with the color image. Â© 2014 ICIC International.

classification.classification-description: Computer Software, Data Handling and Applications
